author: China Insights-SOHTV
description:
#communist kids singing 
From poems praising Xi to textbooks glorifying the Party—this is how the CCP molds children to believe its leaders are flawless. Indoctrination starts young, and alternative voices are silenced.
title: How the CCP Shapes Young Minds#shorts

author: China Insights-SOHTV
description:
What happened in Beijing on June 4th, 1989, remains one of the most silenced and distorted chapters in modern history. Eyewitnesses describe scenes of chaos, bravery, and tragedy as crowds faced off with armored vehicles and live rounds. This video brings together rare testimonies, historical records, and international documents that reveal what was lost—and what must be remembered.

From the student-led calls for reform to the overnight deployment of military units, we explore the events and aftermath that still impact millions today. Learn how the official narrative has shifted over time, and why open discussion remains so restricted—even decades later.

This story isn’t just about the past. It’s about truth, memory, and the cost of silence.
title: What You Were Never Meant to See. |China Insights|
